about.description:
Quart-Trio is an extension for Quart to support the Trio event loop.
This is an alternative to using the asyncio event loop present in the Python
standard library and supported by default in Quart.
about.summary: Quart-Trio is an extension for Quart to support the Trio event loop

name: quart-trio
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "Quart-Trio" %}
{% set version = "0.5.1" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: dafc8f0440d4b70fa60d24122a161d2373894d2bfa9f713d9f1df1fd508f0834

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3.7.0
    - pip
  run:
    - python >=3.7.0
    - quart >=0.11.1
    - trio >=0.10.0
    - hypercorn >=0.6.0

test:
  imports:
    - quart_trio

about:
  home: https://gitlab.com/pgjones/quart-trio
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Quart-Trio is an extension for Quart to support the Trio event loop
  description: |
    Quart-Trio is an extension for Quart to support the Trio event loop.
    This is an alternative to using the asyncio event loop present in the Python
    standard library and supported by default in Quart.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - scopatz
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.6.15
